Test Name: Cytomegalovirus (CMV) Molecular Detection, PCR, Lower Respiratory Specimen
Specimen Type: Lower respiratory specimens (bronchoalveolar lavage fluid and sputum)
Purpose: To detect Cytomegalovirus DNA in lower respiratory specimens from patients with suspected lower respiratory tract infections using PCR.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof container suitable for BAL or sputum collection
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument (e.g., Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Real-Time PCR System) and nucleic acid extraction system (e.g., QIAGEN QIAcube or manual extraction kits)
